attributes.action: pass a bill that means The House of Commons must vote on any decisions to go to war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We went to war in iraq without our MP's being allowed to vote on it.  We went to war in iraq without the cabnet being allowed to vote on it.

This must not happen again.
We want the House of Commons to vote on all future decisions to declare war.
